# Check for correct naming of temporary executable

#Test for single file specified
cd m/x/y/z/
go run foo.go
stderr 'foo'

#Test for current directory
go run .
stderr 'z'

#Test for set path
go run m/x/y/z/
stderr 'z'

-- m/x/y/z/foo.go --
package main
import(
	"os"
	"path/filepath"
)
func main() {
	println(filepath.Base(os.Args[0]))
}

-- m/x/y/z/foo.go --
package main
import(
	"os"
	"path/filepath"
)
func main() {
	println(filepath.Base(os.Args[0]))
}

-- m/x/y/z/foo.go --
package main
import(
	"os"
	"path/filepath"
)
func main() {
	println(filepath.Base(os.Args[0]))
}
